Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The feedback from my teacher could be more relevant to the knowledge in the class and can help me to get higher score, while for feedback from GenAI, I usually need to refine the question many times to get the answer I want, it's kind of wasting time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I can ask as many times as I want, and I won't worry that GenAI will be boring or not willing to answer my questions or my question is stupid. My feeling will be more slight when get feedback from GenAI.
